page_content: The page provides information on medical care, advising individuals to consult a general practitioner in case of illness or minor accidents, and to visit a hospital for severe emergencies.
The page provides directions to Justizvollzugsanstalt Wauwilermoos, a correctional facility, including the nearest highway exits and contact information.
The page focuses on public sensitization and further education regarding the integration of immigrants, organized by the Department of Social Affairs and Society of Canton Lucerne.
The page discusses the history of the first public clock in Lucerne, installed in Graggenturm in 1385, including a detailed instruction manual for its operation from a historical document.
The page serves as an index of terms relating to various governmental and institutional topics in Canton Lucerne.

The page outlines an information concept for the integration of immigrants in Canton Lucerne, focusing on providing necessary information and support to new arrivals for a smoother integration process.
The page shares various historical stories and documents related to Canton Lucerne, covering a wide range of topics from local inventions to significant events in the region's history.
